instruction: Check the names in column "Names with duplicates" and put the unique ones in column "Unique Names". Keep the original order.

minimal: `MOUSE_DOWN` the first item in column "Names with duplicates"
`DRAG_TO` from the first item to the last item in column "Names with duplicates"
`MOUSE_UP` the last item in column "Names with duplicates"
`CLICK` '=' (default) in Condition in the Standard Filter dialog
`CLICK` 'Not Empty' in Value in the Standard Filter dialog
`CLICK` input box below copy results to inform the cell address where the unique entries are to be entered.
batched: `MOUSE_DOWN` the first item in column "Names with duplicates"
`DRAG_TO` from the first item to the last item in column "Names with duplicates"
`MOUSE_UP` the last item in column "Names with duplicates"
`CLICK` '=' (default) in Condition in the Standard Filter dialog
`CLICK` 'Not Empty' in Value in the Standard Filter dialog
`CLICK` input box below copy results to inform the cell address where the unique entries are to be entered.
